TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
Sorry, we are fresh out.

Waiter, my soup appears to be a Mimic

Thank you for dining with us, sir!

Waiter! Why is a rock from Eve in here?

And also, we must applaud the entrance of our contestant, Page #137!
applause sounds

It's an extrakerbestrial music day.

Waiter! Please, a bowl and two fingers.

Sorry, but the bowl ate the fingers.

Customer: I'd like some positivity please.

It's AAA battery, take the plus.

Cook! A cookie for the cookie thread, please.

We don't serve cookies, this is a dead-Kerbal resturant.

C: W, there's an @ColdJ in my soup!

Sorry, we had to cooldown the soup, and we don't even have more ice on the frezzer, neither we have a frezzer.

Waiter! There's a Hype Train ticket in my soup!

cHUGGA cHUGGA cHOO cHOO

Waiter, there's a FRANXX in my soup and it "thoroughly refuses" to leave! That's its words!

Ah, we barely care. Drink the soup with all your might. Here's a ladle.

Waiter! Can you make my soup spicier?

Of course. Have a handul of sand into it, Don't be afraid, it's the spice sand from Dune, look at these worm craps around.

Waiter! Are these sausages wormsages, or why are they moving?

They're wormsages! Enjoy our most exotic dish.

Waiter! Why is my soup campaigning for a president? It literally has a sign!

Waiter: It is a sign of the times, anything can be president these days.

Customer: I asked for soup and got the Sloop John B instead.

Yes. Didn't you read the sign? This is a sloop counter!

C: W, there's an army of army ants in my soup!

Those are my Ants! Do not kill them!

Waiter!!! My soup is under attack!!!

Then you should attack it, too. Stop crying, I won't comfort you. I'm not sympathetic, if I say so myself.

Spoiler

That was satirical, I'm sympathetic and/or empathetic

Waiter! My soup is spelled psuo!

Our cook's hands are shaking after the yesterday, take your spnoo and reorder the leettrs.

Waiter! This artichoke looks choked.

Yes Sir, freshly choked this morning.

Customer: 4 coloured carrot soup please.

Your boiled carrots from four sorts of coloured soil and water.

Waiter! Brahminbecue, please.

Just a stick.

Waiter! Bill, please.

Oh, you asked for a bill? sorry, we only have Ribmund and Val. You... want to try it?

Waiter! This soup is saying random Cyrillic phrases! And it's waving a Soviet union flag!

Oh no... that was for our Soviet customer! We're so sorry, sir. Here's a free cheeseburger from McDonalds, fresh yesterday. Exposed to air - kitchen air.

Waiter! Who told you to put the whole menu in one bowl? There's fried rice here!

The fried rice is all we have, and all you get.

Waiter! I ordered a burrito, and you have brought a taco. Close it immediately!

Sad to say, the burrito was cursed. It caused the plague we now know as Partying At The Sea.

Waiter! What is your name?

The waiters don't have names. They lack personalities. That's why they need the on-chest captions to be distinguished.

Waiter! Is it 1795 or 1796 old bottle of Coca-Cola?

Waiter: Ahh, here Sir, put these rose coloured glasses on. There you go now you can see I have brought you a 1975 bottle.

Customer: A bowl of cola soup and a packet of Mentos please.
